about.details:
Incorporated in 1983, Continental Seeds and Chemicals Limited is a Delhi based company engaged in the business of developing, processing, grading and supplying of all kind of agricultural foundation and certified seeds and trading of Mentha Oil.

Continental Seeds has two processing units at:

i) Ram Raj Road, Bazpur, Distt. Udhamsingh Nagar, Uttrakhand -262401; and
ii) Village- Rahiya, Opp. Roadways work shop on Kanpur Orai Highway, Orai, Distt. Jallaun, U.P.

The total production capacity of company is 7080 MT per annum out of which around 45% is currently used.

The Company has 15 employees in its payroll. It also employs temporary workers on per day wages basis.

faqs.question: What is the Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO?
faqs.answer:
Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO is a SME IPO of 1620000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.21 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹26 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on March 21, 2018, and closes on March 23, 2018.

Mas Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO opens on March 21, 2018 and closes on March 23, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO?
faqs.answer: Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,04,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Continental Seeds and Chemicals Ltd IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
